Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '196'. Name Diodotos. There were two fabricants of the name Diodotos, whose careers may have overlapped; see I. Nicolaou, Paphos V, 2005, 157.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (133)
